metadata.title: Please tell me which TSN standards are supported by the RZ/N2L.

sections.content:
Question:
Please tell me which TSN standards are supported by the RZ/N2L.
Answer:
The following TSN standards can be supported.
IEEE 802.1AS-2020:Timing and Synchronization for Time-Sensitive Applications
IEEE 802.1Qbv:Enhancements for Scheduled Traffic
IEEE 802.1Qbu,IEEE 802.3br:Frame Preemption
IEEE 802.1Qch,Cyclic Queuing and Forwarding
IEEE 802.1Qci:Per-Stream Filtering and Policing
IEEE 802.1CB: Frame Replication and Elimination for Reliability (Active Stream identification)
Suitable Products
RZ/N2L
